channel.title: How can i change what a npc hit and its hp?(317)
channel.description: How can i change the hp of an npc and also change what the npc hit like if i want it to hit 10 but it hits 30 its a 317 server

item.title: How can i change what a npc hit and its hp?(317)
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

NPC.cfg

Search the NPC’s ID

it will have something like:

npc = (NPC ID) (CB LEVEL) (NPC HP LEVEL) (NPC RESPAWN TIME)

eg.

npc = 21 21 30 5

the higher the combat level, the higher it will hit,
change the hp to make it have more health
change the spawn time to how long you want it to take to spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change what a npc hit and its hp?(317)

item.title: How can i change what a npc hit and its hp?(317)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Find something to do with the NPC ID and look for hitDiff, then change the stuff there to fit what you want

Read full topic
